website_summaries.verdict: A fast-absorbing, hydrating body lotion, but not everyone can stand the scent.
pros: Quickly absorbs without leaving a residue
Large bottle lasts a long time
cons: A few customers find the scent unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: including those recommended by my dermatologist
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many lotions, including those recommended by my dermatologist. I was skeptical of this, because the "Dead Sea" aspect just seemed a little gimmicky. However, after one day of using this lotion (immediately post-shower), I fell in love with it. Noticeable improvement in my skin's softness, within the first day. I also love the scent. It's a very unique scent - can't describe it other than to say it's "clean and fresh" smelling. My husband thinks it's strongly scented. Like this so much I will be giving it for Christmas gifts. I'm a believer now! I also like that it's in a pump dispenser. Makes it very easy to use single handed.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: A Delighted 10 Year Customer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this moisturizer on my face and body for 10 years & love it! This is the kind of moisturizer that sinks in, not the kind that forms a barrier on the top of your skin. It has a very clean, mild fragrance, so it is not exactly 100% hypo-allergenic, but I have very sensitive skin and it still agrees with me. My husband has started using it now too & loves it, because it sinks in faster than Eucerin and Aveno.
customer_reviews.author: TripleLeo

customer_reviews.title: ... sample pack back from Isreal and I fell in love! The smell isn't my favorite
customer_reviews.text: My brother brought me a sample pack back from Isreal and I fell in love! The smell isn't my favorite, but it's definitely NOT bad and actually, the scent is pretty light. BUT, this is the most amazing lotion. Easy to put on, keeps my skin feeling hydrated and smooth without greasy or sticky like cream. AHAVA is definitely a new favorite for me!
customer_reviews.author: KLa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this lotion enough to pay $40 dollars for it. I have sensitive skin on my legs, face, and chest and I can use this lotion everywhere, even on my legs immediately after shaving (which would normally give me a bright red burning rash if I used anything other than coconut oil or cocoa butter) and it makes me skin incredibly soft. It has a really soft perfumey scent to it which I love. The product came on time & in good condition and well!
customer_reviews.author: D_Joines

customer_reviews.title: Super concentrated

Yes, I recommend this excellent body moisturizer.

product_meta.title: AHAVA Mineral Body Lotion
product_meta.description:
Size:24 Ounce| Style:Original 750 ML

MINERAL BODY LOTION

 • Absorbent cream that quickly nourishes dry skin
• Made with nutrient-rich Dead Sea water
• Helps maintain healthy, hydrated skin that lasts all day

DESCRIPTION

Treat yourself to a light but luxuriously rich body lotion that helps nourish itchy, dry skin and maintain softness. Best-selling formula absorbs quickly without feeling greasy or sticky and is made with nutrient-rich Dead Sea water, aloe vera and smoothing Witch Hazel.

 • Replenish skin with 21 essential minerals, including magnesium, calcium, and potassium
• Fast-absorbing, non-greasy lotion nourishes dry, itchy skin, providing refreshing hydration
• Formulated for daily use, to elevate and lock in skin’s moisture

KEY BENEFITS
Hydrating
Moisturizing
Softening

THIS PRODUCT IS
Hypoallergenic
Vegan
Paraben-free

HOW TO USE
Apply liberally on clean skin after bath or shower.

INGREDIENTS

Aqua (Mineral Spring Water), Ceteareth-30 & Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Propanediol(Corn derived Glycol), Caprylyl Glycol & Chlorphenesin & Phenoxyethanol, Maris Sal (Dead Sea Water), Dimethicone, Parfum (Fragrance), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Flower Water, Alpha- Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Isoeugenol, Linalool.



BRAND STORY


OUR PROMISE

At AHAVA, we let nature lead our science to design formulas that bring the best beauty directly to you.

VEGAN • PARABEN FREE • LIKE ALL AHAVA PRODUCTS HAVE ALWAYS BEEN
